## Styling Project via YAML metadata keys

### Website Level 

using `_quarto.yml` file which exists at the root directory of the project

### Page Level 

using Page YAML header which is placed at the top of the document and starts end ends with a line that only contain 3 dashes `---`

### Code Block Level 

using code block YAML options which are proceeded by `#| `
